text: Teatr-e Shahr Metro Station is a station in Tehran Metro Line 4 and Line 3. It is located at the intersection of Enghelab Street and Valiasr StreetVali Asr station page near the location of Teatr-e Shahr, in Daneshjoo Park. The station was formerly known as Vali Asr Metro Station. However, its name was officially changed on February 2, 2016, in order to avoid confusions with the newer Meydan-e Vali Asr Metro Station.ISNA-در جلسه امروز شورای شهر تهران تصویب شد/تغییر نام ایستگاه مترو ولیعصر (عج) به تئاتر شهر ==References== Category:Tehran Metro stations
title: Teatr-e Shahr Metro Station
